recipes.name: Kung Pao Chicken
recipes.instructions:
1. Cut chicken into cubes
2. Marinate with soy sauce
3. Heat oil in wok
4. Stir-fry chicken
5. Add chilies and peanuts
6. Add sauce and toss
7. Serve with rice

recipes.name: Fried Rice
recipes.instructions:
1. Use day-old cooked rice
2. Heat oil in wok
3. Add garlic, stir for 30 seconds
4. Add vegetables, stir-fry
5. Add rice, break lumps
6. Add soy sauce, mix well
7. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes
8. Serve hot

recipes.name: Sweet and Sour Pork
recipes.instructions:
1. Cut pork into pieces
2. Coat with cornstarch
3. Deep fry until golden
4. Stir-fry vegetables
5. Add pineapple and sauce
6. Add fried pork
7. Toss and serve
